terms.title: Welcome
terms.intro: This is a sample terms of use text. By using the app you agree to the following conditions.
terms.item1: 1. Use of service: App content is for informational purposes and may change. Users must use content under their responsibility.
terms.item2: 2. Disclaimer: The app provider does not guarantee continuous availability or error-free content.
terms.item3: 3. Privacy: Users' personal data will be processed according to the privacy policy. (This sample project may not process real data.)
terms.note: This text is a sample. For a real project prepare legal texts with your legal counsel or update them to comply with local regulations.
